unnormalised: For road trips around Bangalore, remember that NH44 and NH75 are usually the best bets. NH44 can get you to Hyderabad in around 6 hrs, maybe 7 if you take it easy. Check toll charges beforehand; expect to pay around Rs. 500-700 one way. And always carry your DL (driving license) & RC (Registration Certificate) of the vehicle. Plan your pit stops; CCDs & Indian Oil petrol pumps are good options, spaced roughly every 100 km. Happy journey!
normalised: For road trips around Bangalore, remember that N-H-forty four and N-H-seventy five are usually the best bets. N-H-forty four can get you to Hyderabad in around six hours, maybe seven if you take it easy. Check toll charges beforehand; expect to pay around rupees five hundred to seven hundred one way. And always carry your D-L driving license and R-C Registration Certificate of the vehicle. Plan your pit stops; C-C-D-s and Indian Oil petrol pumps are good options, spaced roughly every one hundred kilometer. Happy journey!
